name: Cox's Bazar Sea Beach
long_description: Host your dream beach wedding at Cox's Bazar's famous Sea Beach. With its pristine sandy shores and stunning ocean views, Sea Beach provides a picturesque backdrop for your special day. Exchange vows with the sound of waves in the background and create memories to last a lifetime.

name: Sylhet Tea Garden
long_description: Experience the tranquility of a tea garden wedding in the lush hills of Sylhet. Surrounded by acres of tea plantations, this venue offers a serene and picturesque setting. Say 'I do' amidst the emerald tea leaves, and let the natural beauty of Sylhet create a magical atmosphere for your special day.

name: Bashundhara Convention
long_description: For an elegant and urban wedding experience, choose the Bashundhara Convention Center in the heart of Dhaka. With its modern architecture and state-of-the-art facilities, this venue offers a grand and sophisticated backdrop for your wedding celebration. Create cherished memories in the vibrant city of Dhaka.
